siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Stan is still on the grid, the rumors have been greatly exaggerated. Jon tries to up listenership with a Milkshake review. Stan has been becoming a master wine maker and. Jon got a new toy this week, he gives his initial review of the AirPods Pro. We also talk allâ€¦
